dashboard.label: Exploration New

Total"},"viz_chart_1":{"type":"viz.fillergauge","options":{"orientation":"x","charting.gaugeColors":"["0xdc4e41","0xf8be34","0x53a051"]","ranges":[{"from":0,"to":30,"value":"#dc4e41"},{"from":30,"to":80,"value":"#f8be34"},{"from":80,"to":100,"value":"#53a051"}],"backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_7"},"title":"Average Progress","encoding":{"gaugeColor":{"field":"encoding.value","format":{"type":"rangevalue","ranges":[{"from":90,"value":"#4beba8","to":100},{"from":60,"value":"#f4df7a","to":90},{"from":30,"value":"#fc9850","to":60},{"from":0,"value":"#ff7152","to":30}]}}}},"viz_chart_2":{"type":"viz.fillergauge","options":{"orientation":"x","charting.gaugeColors":"["0xdc4e41","0xf8be34","0x53a051"]","ranges":[{"from":0,"to":30,"value":"#dc4e41"},{"from":30,"to":80,"value":"#f8be34"},{"from":80,"to":100,"value":"#53a051"}],"backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_8"},"title":"Latest Progress","encoding":{"gaugeColor":{"field":"encoding.value","format":{"type":"rangevalue","ranges":[{"from":90,"value":"#4beba8","to":100},{"from":60,"value":"#f4df7a","to":90},{"from":30,"value":"#fc9850","to":60},{"from":0,"value":"#ff7152","to":30}]}}}},"viz_single_7":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"refresh.display":"progressbar","majorValue":"> sparklineValues | lastPoint()","trendValue":"> sparklineValues | delta(-2)","sparklineValues":"> primary | seriesByName('latest_system_name')","backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_9"},"title":"Last System"},"viz_single_8":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_10"},"title":"Bodys"},"viz_single_9":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_11"},"title":"Non Bodys"},"viz_single_10":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_12"},"title":"Σ Bodys"},"viz_single_11":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_13"},"title":"Σ Non Bodys"},"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"drilldown":"none"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_14"},"title":"Visited Systems"},"viz_highlight":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":50,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"refresh.display":"progressbar","rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true,"columnFormat":{"WasDiscovered":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("WasDiscovered") | formatByType(WasDiscoveredColumnFormatEditorConfig)"},"value":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("value") | formatByType(valueColumnFormatEditorConfig)"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_15"},"title":"Scanned Planets","context":{"WasDiscoveredColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"string":{"unitPosition":"after"}},"valueColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":true,"unitPosition":"after","precision":0}}}},"viz_YMO1YSes":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Jump Distance"}},"viz_JsKSMeny":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Fuel Statistics"}},"viz_lQaQLHx3":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"FSS Scan","fontWeight":"bold","fontSize":28}},"viz_nwsoVXT1":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"stroke":"transparent","strokeWidth":0,"fill":"#0877a6"}},"viz_4YgHmgb4":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"stroke":"transparent","strokeWidth":0,"fill":"#af575a"}},"viz_kHgTI6Ky":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"stroke":"transparent","strokeWidth":0,"fill":"#4fa484"}},"viz_MWaOdKWR":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Latest
","fontWeight":"bold"}},"viz_p1Eq3ir5":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Total","fontWeight":"bold"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_ed_fss_discovery_scan_stats":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`ed_index` event IN ("FSSDiscoveryScan", "FSSAllBodiesFound")
| eval Progress=if(event=="FSSAllBodiesFound", 1, Progress)
| eval BodyCount=coalesce(BodyCount, Count)
| dedup SystemName sortby -_time
| stats sum(BodyCount) as total_body_count sum(NonBodyCount) as total_non_body_count avg(Progress) as avg_progress latest(Progress) as latest_progress latest(BodyCount) as latest_body_count latest(NonBodyCount) as latest_non_body_count latest(SystemName) as latest_system_name","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$token_datetime.earliest$","latest":"$token_datetime.latest$"}},"name":"ds_ed_fss_discovery_scan_stats"},"ds_ed_fsdjump":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`ed_index` event=FSDJump
| eval SystemEconomy=coalesce(SystemEconomy_Localised, SystemEconomy)
| eval SystemGovernment=coalesce(SystemGovernment_Localised, SystemGovernment)
| eval SystemSecondEconomy=coalesce(SystemSecondEconomy_Localised, SystemSecondEconomy)
| eval SystemSecurity=coalesce(SystemSecurity_Localised, SystemSecurity)
| table *","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$token_datetime.earliest$","latest":"$token_datetime.latest$"}},"name":"ds_ed_fsdjump"},"ds_ed_fuelscoop":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`ed_index` event=FuelScoop
| table *","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$token_datetime.earliest$","latest":"$token_datetime.latest$"}},"name":"ds_ed_fuelscoop"},"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"stats latest(JumpDist) as latest_jump_dist","extend":"ds_ed_fsdjump"}},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"stats sum(JumpDist) as total_jump_dist","extend":"ds_ed_fsdjump"}},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"stats latest(FuelUsed)","extend":"ds_ed_fsdjump"}},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"stats latest(Scooped) as fuel_scooped","extend":"ds_ed_fuelscoop"}},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"stats sum(FuelUsed)","extend":"ds_ed_fsdjump"}},"ds_search_6":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"stats sum(Scooped) as fuel_scooped","extend":"ds_ed_fuelscoop"}},"ds_search_7":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"eval avg_progress=avg_progress*100
| fields avg_progress","extend":"ds_ed_fss_discovery_scan_stats"}},"ds_search_8":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"eval latest_progress=latest_progress*100
| fields latest_progress","extend":"ds_ed_fss_discovery_scan_stats"}},"ds_search_9":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"fields latest_system_name","extend":"ds_ed_fss_discovery_scan_stats"}},"ds_search_10":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"fields latest_body_count","extend":"ds_ed_fss_discovery_scan_stats"}},"ds_search_11":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"fields latest_non_body_count","extend":"ds_ed_fss_discovery_scan_stats"}},"ds_search_12":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"fields total_body_count","extend":"ds_ed_fss_discovery_scan_stats"}},"ds_search_13":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"fields total_non_body_count","extend":"ds_ed_fss_discovery_scan_stats"}},"ds_search_14":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`ed_index` event=FSDJump
| stats latest(_time) as _time by StarSystem
| table StarSystem","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$token_datetime.earliest$","latest":"$token_datetime.latest$"}},"name":"Visited Star Systems"},"ds_search_15":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`ed_index` event=Scan
| sort - _time 
| fillnull value="None" TerraformState
| eval TerraformState=if(TerraformState!="", TerraformState, "None")
| lookup ed_scan_payouts.csv PlanetClass TerraformState OUTPUT FullScanPayout FDFullScanPayout
| eval FullPayout=if(WasDiscovered=="false", FDFullScanPayout, FullScanPayout)
| eval IsInteresting=if(FullPayout>100000 AND DistanceFromArrivalLS<200000, "true", "false")
| eval StarOrPlanetType=coalesce(StarType, PlanetClass)
| eval Landable=if(Landable=="true", Landable ." (" .round(SurfaceGravity, 2) ." G)", Landable)

| join type=left SystemAddress BodyID 
 [search `ed_index` event=SAAScanComplete
 | eval isMapped="true"
 | eval withEfficiencyBonus = if(ProbesUsed <= EfficiencyTarget, "true", "false")
 | table SystemAddress BodyID isMapped withEfficiencyBonus]

| lookup ed_planet_k_values PlanetClass TerraformState OUTPUT k
| lookup ed_star_k_values StarType OUTPUT k
| eval k = coalesce(k, if(StarType=="*", 1200, 300))
| eval q = 0.56591828
| eval isFirstDiscoverer = if(WasDiscovered=="false", "true", "false"), isFirstMapped = if(WasMapped=="false" AND isMapped="true", "true", "false")
| eval mappingMultiplier = if(isMapped=="true", if(isFirstDiscoverer=="true" AND isFirstMapped=="true", 3.699622554, if(WasMapped=="false", 8.0956, 3.3333333333)), 1)
| eval mass = coalesce(MassEM, StellarMass)
| eval value=(k + k * q * pow(mass, 0.2)) * mappingMultiplier
```we just assume its odyssey```
| eval value = if("$token_isOdyssey$"=="true", if(isMapped=="true", value + max(value*0.3, 555), value), value)
| eval value = if(isMapped=="true" AND withEfficiencyBonus=="true", value*1.25, value)
| eval value = max(value, 500)
| eval value = if(isFirstDiscoverer=="true", value * 2.6, value)
| eval value = if("$token_carrierSell$"=="true", value * 0.75, value)
| eval value = round(value, 0)

| table _time BodyName IsInteresting StarOrPlanetType WasDiscovered WasMapped TerraformState Landable FullPayout value DistanceFromArrivalLS","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$token_datetime.earliest$","latest":"$token_datetime.latest$"}}}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"token_datetime","options":{"token":"token_datetime","defaultValue":"-4h@m,now"}},"input_2":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Odyssey?","options":{"token":"token_isOdyssey","defaultValue":"true","items":[{"value":"true","label":"Yes"},{"value":"false","label":"No"}]}},"input_3":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Carrier Sell?","options":{"token":"token_carrierSell","defaultValue":"true","items":[{"value":"true","label":"Yes"},{"value":"false","label":"No"}]}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":3450,"width":1920},"structure":[{"item":"viz_kHgTI6Ky","type":"block","position":{"x":650,"y":0,"w":700,"h":580}},{"item":"viz_4YgHmgb4","type":"block","position":{"x":220,"y":0,"w":430,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_nwsoVXT1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":220,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":50,"w":200,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_2","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":150,"w":200,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_3","type":"block","position":{"x":230,"y":50,"w":200,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_4","type":"block","position":{"x":440,"y":50,"w":200,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_5","type":"block","position":{"x":230,"y":150,"w":200,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_6","type":"block","position":{"x":440,"y":150,"w":200,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":660,"y":50,"w":400,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":670,"y":240,"w":400,"h":180}},{"item":"viz_single_7","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":450,"w":400,"h":120}},{"item":"viz_single_8","type":"block","position":{"x":1080,"y":80,"w":130,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_9","type":"block","position":{"x":1190,"y":80,"w":130,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_10","type":"block","position":{"x":1080,"y":220,"w":130,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_11","type":"block","position":{"x":1190,"y":220,"w":130,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":260,"w":650,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_highlight","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":600,"w":1850,"h":1500}},{"item":"viz_YMO1YSes","type":"block","position":{"x":25,"y":0,"w":170,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_JsKSMeny","type":"block","position":{"x":360,"y":0,"w":150,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_lQaQLHx3","type":"block","position":{"x":950,"y":0,"w":120,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_MWaOdKWR","type":"block","position":{"x":1140,"y":30,"w":80,"h":50}},{"item":"viz_p1Eq3ir5","type":"block","position":{"x":1150,"y":170,"w":70,"h":50}}],"globalInputs":["input_1","input_2","input_3"]},"description":"","title":"Exploration New"}
